June 26, 1943 D Yorkshire Championships (Third Section)
Yorkshire Area (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-third-section National Championship of Great Britain (Third Section Final)
Yorkshire
Third
Odsal Stadium, Bradford This contest (began 1943?) was not run as an Area contest in the Nationals sequence, but the 1945 running of this event was taken as the first running of the North Eastern (later Yorkshire) area contest. Also referred to as "Yorkshire Festival". Only 2 bands competed
Oct. 29, 2014, 2:10 a.m. Sept. 13, 2017, 12:59 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Mills Junior Unknown
2 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Unknown
